title: [GAMEPLAY][CLIENT] Gingerbread ward skin is not there
body: I got the ward skin through hextech crafting, and now its gone. I've used it in games before, and I've seen other people use AFTER mine vanished, so ik the skin is still there. plz help fix it, thank you.

replies.body: the same happened to me. help pls

Hey! 

There is current a bug preventing you from seeing certain ward skins. Don't worry - you still own them! 

In the meantime, we're looking into what's causing this.
Happened to me too with the gingerbread ward only! I guess they're fixing it soon :)
